original_text: Why do you see the speck that is in your brother's eye, but do not notice the log that is in your own eye?
korean_text: 어찌하여 형제의 눈 속에 있는 티는 보고 네 눈 속에 있는 들보는 깨닫지 못하느냐

sentences.original_text: Why do you see the speck
that is in your brother's eye
but do not notice the log
that is in your own eye?
